items.episodeTitle: The latest ITV News headlines - as Prince Harry's interview is broadcast
items.synopsis: Watch a short summary of today's top stories from the ITV News team.

items.episodeTitle: Harry accuses royals of 'getting into bed with the devil' and says it 'became Meghan versus Kate'
items.synopsis: In an interview with ITV's Tom Bradby, Harry claimed his step-mother Camilla used to leak stories to the media to enhance her own reputation.

items.episodeTitle: Prince Harry's ITV interview: Watch six key moments
items.synopsis: The Duke of Sussex's 90-minute interview with Tom Bradby covered a wide range of topics. Here are some of the key moments.
Thousands of supporters of Brazil's former presidenthave breached security to invade the country's Congress in the capital Brasilia.

items.episodeTitle: Harry: The Interview - What did ITV News' Royal Editor make of it?
items.synopsis: Chris Ship gives his analysis after the Duke's sit-down with Tom Bradby.

items.episodeTitle: Nursing union welcomes Prime Minister's willingness to reopen talks over pay
items.synopsis: The Royal College of Nursing say the Prime Minister's comments on pay on the BBC's 'Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg' programme give them a "chink of optimism."

items.episodeTitle: China reopens borders with millions expected to travel for Lunar New Year
items.synopsis: The country has lifted the requirement for travellers to quarantine. But there are concerns it could make the surge in covid cases even worse.

items.episodeTitle: Teacher shot by six-year-old in U.S. showing signs of improvement
items.synopsis: Abby Zwerner suffered life-threatening injuries after the incident in Virginia on Friday, which police have said was "not an accident".

items.episodeTitle: Team behind the first orbital space launch from the UK prepare for take-off
items.synopsis: Final arrangements are being made ahead of several satellites being blasted into space from Cornwall Airport near Newquay.

items.episodeTitle: Take a trip to the Lake District - but not quite as you've seen it before
items.synopsis: Meet the man who spent years building a model of the Lake District, using thousands of pieces of Lego. And he's not done yet.

items.episodeTitle: The Rundown: ITV News' daily update for teenagers
items.synopsis: Watch a new edition of The Rundown every afternoon.

items.episodeTitle: Mix of sunny spells and blustery winds: Here's the latest ITV Weather forecast
items.synopsis: Watch the latest UK forecast from the ITV Weather team.
Catch up with the most recent edition of ITV News.
